snippet.title: The future of computing has a name: Chromebook
snippet.description: Jack Wallen tackles the enigma of enigmas, otherwise known as the Chromebook. Do you think the Chromebook is the future of computing?

snippet.title: Linux Deepin is a fringe Linux distribution that could steal your heart
snippet.description: Jack Wallen digs into Linux Deepin and comes out impressed. See what this fringe Linux distribution has to offer, and discover if its your next platform.
